2D virtual reality for tethered walking flies

2D virtual reality for tethered walking flies

A tethered fruit fly walking in a 2D visual virtual reality.

More information on the treadmill setup can be found on this wiki-page (FlyFizz).


Back

Overview

Categories: Fruit fly, Spherical treadmill, Behavior, VR,

Publication: Paper

About

Hi, I'm Hannah. I'm a neuroscientist trying to understand how animals navigate through space. If I'm not in the lab or analysing data, I like to travel, sew, garden or observe animals.
